result.title: Filteration Solutions
result.content:
Accepted Solutions For The Filtration Contest

B. Eid Time

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int T, n, a, ans;

int main(){

    freopen("largest.in", "r", stdin);
    cin.sync_with_stdio(0);

    cin >> T;
    while(T--){
        ans = 0;
        cin >> n;
        while(n--){
            cin >> a;
            ans = max(a, ans);
        }
        printf("%d\n", ans);
    }

    return 0;
}

C. Primeland's holy squares

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lol long long

using namespace std;

int T, n, k, arr[30];

lol R(lol x){
    lol tk = 0;
    for(int i = 1 ; i < (1 << n) ; ++i){
        lol tmp, cnt;
        tmp = 1, cnt = 0;
        for(int j = 0 ; j < n ; ++j){
            if(i & (1 << j)){
                tmp *= arr[j];
                cnt++;
            }
        }
        if(cnt&1) tk += x/tmp;
        else tk -= x/tmp;
    }
    return x-tk;
}

bool ok(lol x){
    //printf("R(%lld): %lld\n", x, R(x));
    return R(x) < k;
}

int main(){

    freopen("number.in", "r", stdin);
    cin.sync_with_stdio(0);

    cin >> T;
    while(T--){
        cin >> n >> k;
        for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++i) cin >> arr[i];
        lol lo = 1, hi = 1e15, mid;
        while(lo < hi){
            mid = (hi+lo+1) >> 1;
            if(ok(mid)){
                lo = mid;
            }else{
                hi = mid-1;
            }
        }
        printf("%lld\n", hi+1);
    }

    return 0;
}

D. How Strong

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

string str;
set<char> s;

int main(){

    getline(cin, str);
    for(char c : str) if(c != ' ') s.insert(c);
    printf("%d", (int)s.size());

    return 0;
}

E. Colorful Wall

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const int N = 1e3;
int n, q, l, r, arr[N];

int main(){

    freopen("wall.in", "r", stdin);
    cin >> n >> q;
    for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++i) cin >> arr[i];
    while(q--){
        cin >> l >> r;
        reverse(arr+l-1, arr+r);
    }
    printf("%d", arr[0]);
    for(int i = 1 ; i < n ; ++i) printf(" %d", arr[i]);

    return 0;
}

F. The Best among Equals

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const int N = 2e5+50;
long long n, l[N], r[N], ans;

int f(long long x){
    int cnt = 0;
    for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++i)
        cnt += (x >= l[i] && x <= r[i]);
    return cnt;
}

int main(){

    cin >> n;
    ans = -1e11;
    for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++i){
        cin >> l[i] >> r[i];
        ans = max(ans, l[i]);
    }

    printf("%d", f(ans));


    return 0;
}

G. Two Points

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

double x[2], y[2], vx[2], vy[2], dx, dy, dvx, dvy, t, d;

int main(){

    cin >> x[0] >> y[0] >> x[1] >> y[1];
    cin >> vx[0] >> vy[0] >> vx[1] >> vy[1];

    dx = x[1] - x[0];
    dy = y[1] - y[0];
    dvx = vx[1] - vx[0];
    dvy = vy[1] - vy[0];

    t = max(-(dx*dvx + dy*dvy)/(pow(dvx, 2) + pow(dvy, 2)), 0.0);
    if(isnan(t)) t = 0;
    d = sqrt(pow(dx+t*dvx, 2) + pow(dy+t*dvy, 2));

    printf("%.9f", d);

    return 0;
}

There is another solution by ternary search

H. Repair

#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

long long a[3], b[3];

bool ok(){
    return  max(b[1], b[2]) <= a[0] && a[1]+a[2] <= b[0] ||
            max(b[1], a[2]) <= a[0] && a[1]+b[2] <= b[0] ||
            max(a[1], b[2]) <= a[0] && b[1]+a[2] <= b[0] ||
            max(a[1], a[2]) <= a[0] && b[1]+b[2] <= b[0] ||
            max(b[1], b[2]) <= b[0] && a[1]+a[2] <= a[0] ||
            max(b[1], a[2]) <= b[0] && a[1]+b[2] <= a[0] ||
            max(a[1], b[2]) <= b[0] && b[1]+a[2] <= a[0] ||
            max(a[1], a[2]) <= b[0] && b[1]+b[2] <= a[0];
}

int main(){

    cin >> a[0] >> b[0] >> a[1] >> b[1] >> a[2] >> b[2];

    if(ok()) printf("YES");
    else printf("NO");

    return 0;
}

I. Robots at Warehouse

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const int N = 2e5+50;
int n, m;
string g[N];
//vector<string> g;
int dx[] = {1, -1, 0, 0};
int dy[] = {0, 0, 1, -1};

bool valid(int ni, int nj){
	return !(ni < 0 || ni >= n || nj < 0 || nj >= m);
}

bool connected(int i, int j){
	if(!valid(i, j) || g[i][j] == '#' || g[i][j] == '$') return 0;
	bool is2, ret = 0;
	is2 = (g[i][j] == '2');
	g[i][j] = '$';
	for(int k = 0 ; k < 4 ; ++k)
		ret |= connected(i+dy[k], j+dx[k]);
	return (is2 || ret);
}

int cnt(int i, int j){
	int c = 0;
	for(int k = 0 ; k < 4 ; ++k){
		int ni = i+dy[k], nj = j+dx[k];
		c += (valid(ni, nj) && g[ni][nj] == '$');
	}
	return c;
}

bool has3(){
	for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++i)
		for(int j = 0 ; j < m ; ++j)
			if(g[i][j] == '$' && cnt(i, j) > 2) return 1;
	return 0;
}

bool no1(){
	for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++i)
		for(int j = 0 ; j < m ; ++j)
			if(g[i][j] == '$' && cnt(i, j) < 2) return 0;
	return 1;
}

int main(){

	int a, b;
	string str;
	
	cin >> n >> m;
	for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++i){
		cin >> g[i];
		for(int j = 0 ; j < m ; ++j)
			if(g[i][j] == '1') a = i, b = j;
	}
	if(connected(a, b) && (has3() || no1())) printf("YES");
	else printf("NO");
	
	/*printf("\n");
	for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; ++i){
		for(int j = 0 ; j < m ; ++j){
			printf("%c ", g[i][j]);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}*/

	return 0;
}

J. Paper Game

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int T, a, b;

int main(){

	cin.sync_with_stdio(0);
	
	cin >> T;
	while(T--){
		cin >> a >> b;
		if((a*b)&1) printf("Hussain\n");
		else printf("Hasan\n");
	}

	return 0;
}
